channel.title: Other ppl cant log in , i can ( help please!)
channel.description: Umm idk what to do, omg I portforwarded all i was in my router page made mopar port 43594 also firewall shit.!. Im in my serv.. But its 0.0.0.0 i did everything even im on it but how i make that ppl can join to like edgepkz.bounceme.net? err. im confused. =S if i type ip 0.0.0.0 then i can log on it. =S

item.title: Other ppl cant log in , i can ( help please!)
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Jesus christ, you all sound like idiots.

p0wnage ~ If you downloaded a source and ran it, AND OPENED THE NO-IP DUC (or whatever other host you use) and they still cant connect, you didnt port forward correctly.

Run the source, then goto www.canyouseeme.org and try port 43594

Read full topic

item.title: Other ppl cant log in , i can ( help please!)
item.dc:creator: @p0wnag3ninja p0wnag3ninja
item.description:
@p0wnag3ninja wrote:

Ffs i DOn know what to do… Im on my serv… even i got client but i put ip 0.0.0.0 i can connect other ppl cant. and also My serv ip is projectedgepkz.no-ip.biz my Friend cant connect… but i portforwarded… was in my router page made 43594 and firewall thing add port name : admin nd port 43594. Um. im confused what else i need to do… i did everything already.

Read full topic

item.source: Other ppl cant log in , i can ( help please!)

item.title: Other ppl cant log in , i can ( help please!)
item.dc:creator: @oron oron
item.description:
@oron wrote:

[quote=“rune-pure, post:4, topic:251586”]WRONG AND WRONG

You need to get a no-ip server lmao

Also USEING YOUR IP???!??!?!?

OMG YOU CAN EASYLY GET CAUGHT BY JAGEX

But follow that step and your fine[/quote]

Are you retarded seriously?

That’s not the reason it’s not working. No-Ip does shit all for his problem.
No-Ip just basically gives the user an easier IP to remember, hence the name ‘No-Ip’.

Do you honestly think 0.0.0.0 is a unique IP-Address out of the hundreds of millions of computers connected to the internet? I pity you if you do.

p0wnag3ninja, first of all you can try getting your external IP from cmyip.co.uk and giving that to your friend, you won’t be able to connect from that yourself.

If that doesn’t work then you’ll have to port forward.
See www.portforward.com for that

oroN

Read full topic

item.title: Other ppl cant log in , i can ( help please!)
item.dc:creator: @oron oron
item.description:
@oron wrote:

Go to a website like cmyip.co.uk and give your friend that I.P address. The I.P your using at the moment is your internal I.P address which only you can access. If it still doesn’t work for your friend then you need to port forward.

Read full topic
